Bash(git -C "D:/Risk-App3.0" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Risk Platform with Nmap, Risk Analysis, and Pentest improvements

Includes full codebase \(Phase 1-2\) plus three key fixes:
- Nmap: Remove 6 root-requiring scan profiles, add 3 non-root alternatives
  \(Quick Scan, Full Service Detection, DNS Enumeration\), add CIDR notation
  support with multi-host finding storage
- Risk Analysis: Rewrite _is_related\(\) with strict port/service matching
  to eliminate false positives \(e.g. Telnet threat no longer matches HTTP
  finding\), mark threat-without-finding risks as [Theoretical]
- Pentest: Add result popup modal on test completion showing findings with
  collapsible evidence and remediation details

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
